data.title: Dong Ngoc Ha | News 2
data.snippet:
Dong Ngoc Ha has also received a number of awards, including the Labor Order (Third Class) in recognition of outstanding achievements in labour, creativity or national construction; a silver medal at the International Biology Olympiad 2020; and First Prize at the Vietnam Biology Olympiad 2020. If Dong Ngoc Ha wins the Global Student Prize, he will use the funds to finance an annual Hanoi Maker Faire, a free online tutoring system, a STEM partnership with Hong Kong and Vietnamese universities, and a Biology For All collaboration with Olympiad Medalists in other subjects.

Office 605 Albert House

 ToucanTech [...] As he grew older, his desire to contribute knowledge to the community also began to grow stronger, and he realised that scientific progress would be the best way to help push his country forward. His new goal was to find new, more effective and more affordable cures for fatal illnesses. Becoming a leading scholar in biology and physics would allow him to integrate knowledge from both fields, improve Vietnamese people’s lives – and beyond that, to contribute to science more widely. [...] As a student, Dong Ngoc Ha has contributed a great deal to his community by tutoring classmates in biology, serving as an Olympiad trainer, and organising academic events and activities. In 2019, he founded the Biology For All Vietnam project – the first pro-bono project for gifted students in Vietnam – and led a team of seven lecturers to teach National Biology Olympiad teams in 10 provinces across Vietnam. During the pandemic, Biology For All also held webinars, provided support, and continue to foster gifted students nationwide.

| "Gift" (그때 우린) | — |  | [...] Ha Dong-kyun (Korean: 하동균; born June 28, 1980), officially known as Ha Dong Qn, is a South Korean singer-songwriter. He debuted in 2002 as a member of the short-lived boy band 7Dayz, before joining the boy band Wanted "Wanted (South Korean band)") in 2004. As a solo singer, he has released two albums: Stand Alone (2006) and Another Corner (2008), and three extended plays: Mark (2012), Word (2014), and Polygon (2017).

Gill "Gill (musician)"), Jung-in) | 75 |  | Non-album single | [...] Ha Dong-hoon (Korean: 하동훈; born on August 20, 1979), better known by his stage name Haha (하하), is a South Korean singer, rapper, variety show host and member of RGP "RGP (duo)"). He is best known for being in the sitcom, Nonstop "Nonstop (South Korean TV series)") and for co-hosting two popular variety programs, MBC's Infinite Challenge and SBS's Running Man "Running Man (South Korean TV series)"). He has also hosted his own show, titled "Ya Man TV" on Mnet "Mnet (TV channel)") in 2015.

data.title: Jeong Dong-ha
data.snippet:
As mentioned above, there was a gloomy period for a while after the debut, but since 2009, I have had many performances every year without a break . His solo concert in the US in 2017 was even sold out.(#fn-19 "Before and after Jeong Dong-ha's performance , big artists such as Sting , Leonard Skynyrd , and Duran Duran also held concerts at the same venue.") Not to mention his performance in music entertainment, he also achieved success as a musical actor by winning the Best Actor Award at the Daegu International Musical Festival (DIMF) . His love for the stage is so great that he said, "I have never felt music as work because the energy given by the audience is always different, and I want to die a natural death on stage." [...] The long run on a yearly basis is impressive, but it has already surpassed almost all records in just a few months since its release . It swept the karaoke scene to the extent that it ranked 5th on M Countdown for two weeks in a row, and ranked first on the TJ Karaoke Chart for the year 2021 . The video on YouTube's automatically created channel exceeded 46 million views in September 2023 . This song was so loved that it won the Special Judge Award at the 31st Seoul Music Awards in 2022.  
  
In October 2021, the follow-up single ' Your Look ' was released in the nature of 'Chuman Nam Part 2'. This song also achieved good results, such as being on the Melon "Melon (sound source service)") Monthly Chart and also on the Karaoke Chart. [...] ## 4. Enduring classics

It is a program that became a turning point in Jeong Dong-ha's music life .
